title: Marketing - Developer I
description: Contributes to the development and maintenance of websites and web applications as part of the development team. Collaborates with the development team and stakeholders to understand project requirements, scope, and timelines. Assists in implementing UI/UX designs and optimizing applications for speed and scalability.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed a community app for a small group using Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. Created a Task Management App leveraging React, JavaScript, and state management, deployed on Vercel Serverless. Currently building a full-stack sports logo trivia app featuring session tracking, timed game sessions, and a leaderboard.

title: Product Owner
description: Led the development and launch of several features on AgentDash, an iOS and web app enabling network agents to efficiently claim and manage referrals. Directed Agile teams of 5 engineers and 2 Quality Engineers, ensuring the timely and budget-conscious delivery of innovative features. Partnered with Marketing and Business Executives to implement features that increased user engagement and retention.

title: Loan Specialist (NMLS# 1638490)
description: Guided borrowers through the VA loan process, enabling home purchases they might not have achieved otherwise. Conducted borrower interviews to educate them on maximizing their VA benefits for homeownership.
